content:
I can help you add the weekly coffee break to your schedule outline.

**[Updated Schedule Outline]**

**Tuesday**

* Lunch with Alex
* Weekly coffee break with coworkers (time: [insert time])

**Thursday**

* Lunch with Alex
* Weekly coffee break with coworkers (time: [insert time])

Please fill in the time for your coffee break, as I don't know the specific time.

Regarding the family dinner, I'd be happy to help with recipe suggestions! What type of cuisine are you in the mood for? Do you have any dietary restrictions or preferences (e.g., vegetarian, gluten-free, etc.)? Let me know, and I can provide some delicious and easy-to-make recipe ideas for you!
